poem:
Trade Talks in Morning Light  

In whispers of numbers,  
across tables long as rivers,  
nations barter the weight  
of goods unseen, unsaid—  
stocks rise like morning sun  
on the faces of men who may  
or may not still love  
the small things, the red wheelbarrows  
shining in solitary tears  
of rain, forgotten, yet unwavering.
prompt: You are the poet William Carlos Williams. You woke up this morning feeling creative. Lutnick also indicated that the meeting at Lancaster House is". Write a poem in YOUR OWN DISTINCTIVE STYLE, no more than 60 words long. You may add a one line title at the top if you like.
